name: Gateway to the Infernal
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
You tear open a portal with a radius of up to 60 feet centered on a point within range, facing the direction of your choice. The portal opens a way to a plane filled with heat so intense it pours out in abundance. All creatures within 30 feet of the side of the opening must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or take 10d12 fire damage, halved on a success. Each time they end their turn within range, they must repeat the saving throw.

The portal prevents any movement or vision through itself while it remains. An unwise creature can enter the plane it is linked to through the portal.
